BookFile.Header:
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1, Also skip works in section 35 which are annual observations made at observatories
For volume AJB 09 Index to the Literature of 1907, started 11 Jan 2020, finished 1 Feb 2020, proofread 5 Feb 2020, second pass started 22 Jan 2021, finished 22 Jan 2021
